title: Emergency Evacuation Guideline Design: Practical Development of Visual Documentation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic graphic design principles, spatial cognition theory, and foundational emergency management
context.additional_context: Practical document design process leveraging mathematical domain expertise (spatial analysis, data visualization)

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate visual components (color, shape, directionality) of emergency evacuation guidelines with 90% accuracy
Learners can produce evacuation route design documentation by applying graphic variables and readability principles
Learners can analyze document layouts that facilitate effective decision-making in stressful situations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
